author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: Suspicious File Download From File Sharing Domain Via Curl.EXE
query: (((process.executable.text:"*\\curl.exe") OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"curl.exe")) AND (((process.command_line:/://[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}/)) OR (process.command_line.text:("*anonfiles.com*" OR "*cdn.discordapp.com\/attachments\/*" OR "*ddns.net*" OR "*ghostbin.co\/*" OR "*gist.githubusercontent.com*" OR "*hastebin.com*" OR "*mediafire.com*" OR "*mega.nz*" OR "*paste.ee*" OR "*pastebin.com*" OR "*pastebin.pl*" OR "*pastetext.net*" OR "*privatlab.com*" OR "*privatlab.net*" OR "*raw.githubusercontent.com*" OR "*send.exploit.in*" OR "*sendspace.com*" OR "*storage.googleapis.com*" OR "*temp.sh*" OR "*transfer.sh*" OR "*ufile.io*"))) AND process.command_line.text:"*http*" AND process.command_line.text:("*\ \-O*" OR "*\-\-remote\-name*" OR "*\-\-output*") AND process.command_line.text:("*.ps1" OR "*.ps1'" OR "*.ps1\"" OR "*.bat" OR "*.bat'" OR "*.bat\"" OR "*.exe" OR "*.exe'" OR "*.exe\"" OR "*.vbs" OR "*.vbs'" OR "*.vbs\"" OR "*.vbe" OR "*.vbe'" OR "*.vbe\"" OR "*.hta" OR "*.hta'" OR "*.hta\"" OR "*.dll" OR "*.dll'" OR "*.dll\"" OR "*.psm1" OR "*.psm1'" OR "*.psm1\""))
